metadata.Title: CVE-2019-8457 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: SQLite3 from 3.6.0 to and including 3.27.2 is vulnerable to heap out-of-bound read in the rtreenode() function when handling invalid rtree tables.

notes.Note: leosilva> db5.3 has a sqlite into /lang/sql/sqlite

criterions.comment: db5.3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
sqlcipher: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
sqlite3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
